title: Design-Studio
description: A simple Figma-like design editor built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.Create shapes, add text & comments, manage layers, and export your design as JSON.

title: Responsive-UI-Clone
description: A pixel-perfect clone of a modern website's UI, built using HTML, SCSS, and JavaScript, fully responsive across devices and screen sizes.

title: Modern-Landing-Page
description: A clean and modern landing page built using HTML, SCSS, and JavaScript, featuring responsive design, smooth animations, and interactive elements.

title: Productivity-Dashboard
description: Productivity dashboard built with HTML, SCSS, and JavaScript, displaying interactive charts, task management features, and clean UI components.

title: Ecommerce-Website-Clone
description: E-commerce website clone built with HTML, SCSS, and JavaScript, replicating a modern online store with product listing, navigation, and UI interactions.
